name: Dodge the Fleas
description:
My daughter and I are building games.  This is a remix of a Godot template game that we are releasing as Dodge the Fleas which is our first collaboration.  She wanted it online so her friends/family could download it.  Donation only.

Simple controls: Up, Down, Left, Right to dodge the mobs.  

If you play it, post your high score as a comment.

We may make updates but no guarantees.  She's 8 :)

Enjoy!
